text: Jean-Louis Bernard (31 March 1938 – 25 March 2020)Avis de décès et obsèques de Jean-Louis BERNARD was a member of the National Assembly of France. and represented the Loiret department. He was born in Saulieu, Côte-d'Or, and was a member of the Radical Party and worked in association with the Union for a Popular Movement. He was the mayor of Orléans from 1988 to 1989. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Saulieu Category:Radical Party (France) politicians Category:Mayors of Orléans Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Politicians from Centre-Val de Loire Category:French surgeons
title: Jean-Louis Bernard
